(:action place ; Place an item into a container and update its location status
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?actor ?item) (inventory ?actor ?container) (not (in ?item ?container)))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?container) (not (on_surface ?item))

(:action separate ; Separate an item using a specified method
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?method - method)
  :precondition (and (in ?item ?container) (inventory ?p ?method))
  :effect (and (separated ?item) (prepared ?container))

(:action freeze_or_thaw
  ; General action to either freeze or thaw an item
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?state - state ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (in ?item ?container) (separated ?item) (lined ?container) (or (and (in_freezer ?item) (frozen ?item) (equals ?state thawed)) (and (not (in_freezer ?item)) (not (frozen ?item)) (equals ?state frozen))))
  :effect (and (when (equals ?state frozen)
                  (and (in_freezer ?item) (frozen ?item) (not (pliable ?item))
